Server

Class ServerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.ServerInterface

  • public class ServerInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides functions to Interface with the airline and timezone servers to query and update information.

    The main function in this file supplies several test cases to validate all server functionality

    Since:
    2016-03-13
    Author:
    Anthony Botelho

      • QueryFlights

        public static java.lang.String QueryFlights(java.lang.String airport_code,
                                            java.lang.String departure_date,
                                            boolean departure)
        Gets the XML string containing flight information for the given airport on a given day
        Parameters:
        airport_code - the 3 character airport code
        departure_date - the date as a string in the format YYYY_MM_DD
        departure - whether or not the request is for departure or arrival flights
        Returns:
        the XML string contianing flight information

      • QueryTimezone

        public static java.lang.String QueryTimezone(double latitude,
                                             double longitude)
        Gets the XML string containing timezone information for the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude of the coordinate
        longitude - the longitude of the coordinate
        Returns:
        an XML string containing timezone information

        Returns:
        the success or failure of the POST
